venue.name: Peter's Park - Joe Wex Dog Run

item.description:
Hi everyone, get ready for a SUNDAY meetup at Peter's Park!

Meetup dues are $3 per frenchie...this covers the $12 monthly fee to host our meetup.com group online. Anything received in excess of the $12 will be donated to the French Bulldog Rescue Network in the group's name. :)

Then after your frenchie is done playing and it's not too hot (especially the pavement!), head on over to the SoWa Open Market , just a block over from the park. Frenchies are VERY welcome at this outdoor craft & farmers market. In fact, Nino's mom will be there with her Bonjour Nino line of jewelry and Bella's parents will be there with their Funky Farmhouse collection of goodies!

Thanks so much, we can't wait to see you! Letitia & Clyde
item.how_to_find_us: Small enclosure for dogs 25lbs and under.

group.name: The Boston French Bulldog Meetup Group

item.name: July French Bulldog Meetup - part deux!
